movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A mind-bending heist movie that explores the concept of dreams within dreams.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind with a twisted sense of humor, in this intense superhero film.

movies.title: oppenheimer
movies.description: Oppenheimer, American and British dramatic biographical film, released in 2023, that explores the life and legacy of the American physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer, who played a key role in the development of the atomic bomb.

movies.title: The Childe
movies.description: "The Childe" focuses on a man born to a Korean father and a Filipino mother who aspires to be a boxer. He travels back to Korea in the hopes of tracking down his father, and in the process, he gets mixed up with some bad people.
